sn36.15:1.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam nisidi, ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn36.15:1.2: “katama nu kho, bhante, vedana, katamo vedanasamudayo, katamo vedananirodho, katama vedananirodhagamini patipada?
sn36.15:1.3: Ko vedanaya assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranan”ti?
sn36.15:1.5: sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana—
sn36.15:1.9: Ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo vedananirodhagamini patipada, seyyathidam—
sn36.15:1.11: Yam vedanam paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam, ayam vedanaya assado.
sn36.15:1.12: Yam vedana anicca dukkha viparinamadhamma, ayam vedanaya adinavo.
sn36.15:1.13: Yo vedanaya chandaragavinayo chandaragappahanam, idam vedanaya nissaranam.
sn36.15:1.14: Atha kho panananda, maya anupubbasankharanam nirodho akkhato.
sn36.15:1.15: Pathamam jhanam samapannassa vaca niruddha hoti …pe…
sn36.15:1.16: sannavedayitanirodham samapannassa sanna ca vedana ca niruddha honti.
sn36.15:1.17: Khinasavassa bhikkhuno rago niruddho hoti, doso niruddho hoti, moho niruddho hoti.
sn36.15:1.18: Atha kho panananda, maya anupubbasankharanam vupasamo akkhato.
sn36.15:1.19: Pathamam jhanam samapannassa vaca vupasanta hoti …pe…
sn36.15:1.20: sannavedayitanirodham samapannassa sanna ca vedana ca vupasanta honti.
sn36.15:1.21: Khinasavassa bhikkhuno rago vupasanto hoti, doso vupasanto hoti, moho vupasanto hoti.
sn36.15:1.22: Atha kho panananda, maya anupubbasankharanam patippassaddhi akkhata.
sn36.15:1.23: Pathamam jhanam samapannassa vaca patippassaddha hoti …pe…
sn36.15:1.28: Sannavedayitanirodham samapannassa sanna ca vedana ca patippassaddha honti.
sn36.15:1.29: Khinasavassa bhikkhuno rago patippassaddho hoti, doso patippassaddho hoti, moho patippassaddho hoti”ti.
